pip:Resource.pip:name: fast
pip:Resource.pip:description:
FAST - FMRIB's Automated Segmentation Tool FAST Version 3.53
Usage: fast [-options] imagefile options: -t<n>: input image type. 1-T1, 2-T2, 3-PD (default T1) -c <n>: number of classes (default 3) -a: use apriori probability maps (for initialisation only) -A: use apriori probability maps (for initialisation and for posteriors) -ap <prefix> | -Ap <prefix>: path+filename prefix to pre-registered (to input data) apriori probability maps, <prefix>_gm _wm and _csf (uncompressed Analyze format) -od <base>: output basename (default <input>) -os: output segmentation with one class per image -op: output probability maps (one for each class) -or: output restored image -ob: output bias correction field -n: do not output segmentation -v<n>: verbose level (0-5; default 1) -h: advanced options

pip:argument.pip:name: >amp
pip:argument.pip:description: Redirect Std Out and Std Error
